reference.shortdesc: A long quotation is a quotation that contains one or more paragraphs. The title and source of the document that is being quoted can be specified.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: The contents of the lq element is typically rendered as an indented block.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample contains a quotation. The cite attribute specifies the title of the document that is quoted.
example.codeblock:
This is the first line of the address that Abraham Lincoln delivered on November 19, 1863 for the dedication of the cemetery at Gettysburg, Pennsylvania.

Four score and seven years ago our fathers brought forth on this continent a new nation, conceived in liberty, and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal. Gettysburg address
